verses.verse: <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> They have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%> They have <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in <S%H5856>heaps.<s%>

They have <S%H5414>given<s%> the dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants<s%> to be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H2623>saints<s%> to the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Their <S%H1818>blood<s%> they have <S%H8210>shed<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> There was no one to bury <S%H6912>them.<s%>
We have become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> a <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> and <S%H7047>derision<s%> to those who are around <S%H5439>us.<s%>
How <S%H3068>long,<s%> Yahweh? Will you be <S%H599>angry<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%> Will your <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> like <S%H784>fire?<s%>
Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H4467>you;<s%> on the kingdoms that <S%H7121>don't<s%> call on your <S%H8034>name;<s%>

<S%H2142>Don't<s%> hold the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of our <S%H7223>forefathers<s%> against <S%H7356>us.<s%> Let your tender mercies <S%H4118>speedily<s%> <S%H6923>meet<s%> <S%H1809>us,<s%> for we are in <S%H3966>desperate<s%> <S%H1809>need.<s%>

<S%H5826>Help<s%> <S%H430>us,<s%> God of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> <S%H1697>for<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of your <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> <S%H3722>us,<s%> and forgive our <S%H2403>sins,<s%> for your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake.

Why should the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "Where is their <S%H430>God?<s%>" Let it be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H1818>blood<s%> is being poured <S%H8210>out.<s%>

Let the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1433>you.<s%> According to the greatness of your <S%H2220>power,<s%> <S%H3498>preserve<s%> those who are <S%H1121>sentenced<s%> to <S%H8546>death.<s%>

Pay <S%H7725>back<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> <S%H7659>seven<s%> times into their <S%H2436>bosom<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach<s%> with which they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord.

So <S%H5971>we,<s%> your people and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of your <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> will give you <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> We will <S%H8416>praise<s%> you <S%H5769>forever,<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
